snippet: The English soccer club is considering listing in the United States instead of Singapore, according to people with knowledge of the matter.
abstract: The English soccer club is considering listing in the United States instead of Singapore, according to people with knowledge of the matter.

byline.original: By MARK SCOTT and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Manchester United Said to Consider Moving Stock Sale to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Manchester United Is Said to Weigh I.P.O. in United States
